message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this incredible product that I think you'll love. Would you like to make an offer on it?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of a price more around $8000. Would you be willing to consider that?
I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go as low as $8000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $9500
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $8800?
I'm willing to compromise further, but I need to make a profit. I can do $9200
I'm getting close, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $9100?
I'm almost there, but I need to get closer to my target. I can do $9500, but that's as low as I can go
I'm really close, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $9000?
I've already offered you a price of $9500, and you've countered at $9000. I'm not willing to go that low, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $9250
